# General information and opening hours

### **Water Park opening hours**

#### **Autumn, Winter & Spring (from September 2 until June 19)**

6.30-22.30 Monday-Friday | 8.00-22.30 Saturday & Sunday¬†**(admission until 21.00 Monday-Sunday)**

#### **Summer (from June 20 until¬†September 1)**

08.00-22.00 Monday-Sunday

(admission until 20.30)

### Awaiting you at the new Kalev Spa Water Park are:

Kalev Spa Water Park is also home to a shop selling swimming and sports accessories at which hotel guests receive a 10% discount on showing their door card.

Our water park, spa complex and well-equipped sports club and [wellness centre](https://www.kalevspa.ee/en/healthandbeauty/) invite you to work out, unwind and give yourself the pampering and attention you deserve. As they say: healthy mind, healthy body!

#### **Opening hours during holidays:**

# 40 things to do during Estonia's black nights

Evenings are extra long during autumn and winter. Don't turn in early! Make the most of the black nights with these 40 attractions and activities.

Visit Estonia

## White nights are great. We get it.

### But Estonia's black nights are far from boring.

We've gathered 40 things to do and places to go in¬†[Tallinn](https://visitestonia.com/en/tallinn) or nearby during autumn and winter's late afternoons and evenings ‚Äî indoors or out. In addition to the seasons' many [traditional holidays](https://visitestonia.com/en/what-to-do/events-in-estonia), there's always something to do when the sun goes down!

## Spend November's black nights at the cinema!

### The Black Nights Film Festival (P√ñFF) will illuminate movie screens in Tallinn from 3 to 27 November.

[P√ñFF](https://visitestonia.com/en/black-nights-film-festival-poff) is one of 15 A-list film festivals accredited by the International Federation of Film Producers Associations (FIAPF) alongside Cannes, Berlin, Cairo, and other leading festivals. It attracts thousands of cinephiles from Estonia and abroad, and screens over 200 feature films and over 300 shorts.

![Movie theater in Tallinn with logo of Black Nights Film Festival](https://visitestonia.com/content-images/724795/40-things-to-do-during-estonias-black-nights-en-001-visit-estonia.jpg)

Photo author: P√ñFF

## The Christmas season will light up the dark nights of December.

### Tallinn's Christmas Market is the main event of the holiday season.

However, Christmas is an important holiday in [Estonian culture](https://visitestonia.com/en/what-to-do/estonian-culture), and the [whole country celebrates](https://visitestonia.com/en/what-to-do/a-fairytale-christmas-in-estonia) in ways both big and small. Tartu also hosts a festive Christmas City on the Town Hall Square, while one-day markets pop up in villages and neighborhoods all over Estonia.

**Take note**: The [2025 Tallinn Christmas Market](https://visitestonia.com/en/tallinn-christmas-market) is open from 21 November until 28 December.

![Tallinn's Christmas market shines bright in the dark nights of December](https://visitestonia.com/content-images/724460/40-things-to-do-during-estonias-black-nights-en-001-visit-estonia.jpg)

Photo author: Kaupo Kalda

## If you can't make it for P√ñFF, try the opera, listen to jazz, or check out the Kai Art Center.

![](https://visitestonia.com/images/738306/rahvusooper-estonia-maja-009-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Estonian National Opera - opera house

Architecture and history

![Kai Art Centre, exterior view](https://visitestonia.com/images/3419386/_DSF5316.jpg)

### Kai Art Centre

Architecture and history

![](https://visitestonia.com/images/3704700/philly_joes_tallinn_estonia.jpg)

### Philly Joe's Jazz Club

Live music and nightclubs

## Old Town is magical when the nights are long.

The cobblestone streets take on a mysterious air. Book a walking tour, sip mulled wine, or dine by candlelight like a medieval merchant.

![Olde Hansa restoran](https://visitestonia.com/images/3986098/2nd+floor%2C+vibe%2C+pax+85.jpg)

### Olde Hansa

Restaurants

![Legends and Stories evening tour in Tallinn's Old Town](https://visitestonia.com/images/682030/tallinna-vanalinna-ohtune-legendide-ja-lugude-tuur-011-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Legends and Stories evening tour in Tallinn's Old Town

Architecture and history

![Happy Days Travel ghost tour in Tallinn's Old Town](https://visitestonia.com/images/737904/happy-days-travel-kummitustuur-tallinna-vanalinnas-014-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Happy Days Travel ghost tour in Tallinn's Old Town

Architecture and history

![Matkafy lantern hikes](https://visitestonia.com/images/737503/matkafy-laternamatkad-011-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Matkafy lantern hikes

Architecture and history

## Pamper yourself with a relaxing massage or an invigorating facial.

Once you start to feel the chill outdoors, head to one of Tallinn's spas. Let the jacuzzi wash away your aches after a day spent hiking or skiing.

![Aqua Spa at Tallink Spa & Conference Hotel](https://visitestonia.com/images/3198729/Aqua+Spa12.jpg)

### Aqua Spa at Tallink Spa & Conference Hotel

Day spas

![Ring Spa and Sauna Centre](https://visitestonia.com/images/4005950/Ring+spaa+ja+saunad+%283%29.jpg)

### Ring Spa & Sauna Centre

Day spas

![Sauna Oasis (18+) Relaxation Area in Kalev Spa Water Park](https://visitestonia.com/images/720366/kalev-spa-veekeskus-sauna-oaas-18-loogastusala-015-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Sauna Oasis (18+) Relaxation Area in Kalev Spa Water Park

Water parks

![Hotel LaSpa Laulasmaa water and sauna centre](https://visitestonia.com/images/4011271/LaSpa+water+and+sauna+centre+_+photographer+Jarek+J%C3%B5epera.jpg)

### Hotel LaSpa water and sauna centre

Day spas

## Planning a night out on the town?

Glamorous speakeasy, wine bar, American-style microbrewery, or hipster hot spot ‚Äî take your pick! The night is extra long, and it's all yours.

![√ïllerestoran P√µhjala Tap Room ja pruulikoda](https://visitestonia.com/images/682074/ollerestoran-pohjala-tap-room-ja-pruulikoda-012-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Beer Restaurant P√µhjala Tap Room and Brewery

Restaurants

![Veinirestoran R14](https://visitestonia.com/images/693836/veinirestoran-r14-012-visit-estonia.png)

### Wine restaurant R14

Restaurants

![Baar Uus Laine](https://visitestonia.com/images/3896725/Uus+laine.jpg)

### Club Uus Laine

Bars & pubs

![Whisper Sister kokteilibaar](https://visitestonia.com/images/3714877/whisper_sister_bar_interior_visit_estonia.jpg)

### Cocktail bar Whisper Sister

Bars & pubs

## Autumn is the time to enjoy seasonal cuisine.

See what innovative chefs can do with pickled pumpkins and mushrooms, smoked meat, and berry preserves, or sample seasonal delicacies at the market.

![Lee Restoran](https://visitestonia.com/images/3689213/DSC_7603.jpg)

### Lee Restaurant

Restaurants

![Vegan Restoran V](https://visitestonia.com/images/3714883/vegan_restoran_v_exterior_visit_tallinn_estonia.jpg)

### Vegan Restaurant V

Restaurants

![Fotografiska Restaurant & Rooftop Garden](https://visitestonia.com/images/706355/fotografiska-tallinn-restoran-baar-016-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Fotografiska Tallinn Restaurant & Bar

Restaurants

![Balti Jaam Market](https://visitestonia.com/images/3728904/balti_jaama_turg_lett_visit_estonia.jpeg)

### Balti Jaam Market

Farmers markets & organic stores

## Tallinn has plenty of opportunities for high-adrenaline indoor activities.

Don't let the cold weather slow you down! From climbing walls to sand volleyball, check out these indoor activities.

![Super Skypark batuudi- ja m√§ngukeskus](https://visitestonia.com/images/638537/super-skypark-batuudi-ja-mangukeskus-009-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Super Skypark Trampoline and Play Center

Theme parks

![Ronimisministeerium Hipodroom](https://visitestonia.com/images/692284/ronimisministeerium-013-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Ronimisministeerium

Active holiday

![Teras Beach Tallinn](https://visitestonia.com/images/4063560/%C3%9Clemiste_keskus_FOTOGRAAF_Rauno_Liivand2.jpg)

### Teras Beach Tallinn

Active holiday

![Adventure Golf Centre](https://visitestonia.com/images/664807/elamusgolfikeskus-015-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Adventure Golf Centre

Active holiday

## Skiing, sledding, skating, and swimming ‚Äî winter sports abound in Estonia.

The city maintains several ice rinks around town, and summertime hiking tracks turn into ski trails in winter. Fancy a challenge? Try winter swimming!

![Old Town Ice rink](https://visitestonia.com/images/637569/vanalinna-uisupark-008-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Old Town Ice rink

Active holiday

![Winter swimming club Lennusulps](https://visitestonia.com/images/730129/lennusulps-winter-swimming-club-009-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Winter swimming club Lennusulps

Day spas

![N√µmme Snow Park](https://visitestonia.com/images/736294/nomme-lumepark-007-visit-estonia.jpg)

### N√µmme Snow Park

Active holiday

![Saku health and ski trails](https://visitestonia.com/images/3736061/saku_rabametsa_terviserada.jpeg)

### Saku health and ski trails

Active holiday

## Nature is open 24/7, every day of the year.

Frozen waterfalls and forests by twilight offer magical black night experiences or get your nature fix on the well-lit trails of Kadriorg Park.

![Kadriorg Park](https://visitestonia.com/images/637059/kadrioru-park-014-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Kadriorg Park

Nature

![P√µhjakonna Stairs](https://visitestonia.com/images/689921/karulaugu-terviserada-ja-pohjakonna-trepp-004-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Karulaugu health and ski trail and P√µhjakonna Stairs

Active holiday

![J√§gala Waterfall](https://visitestonia.com/images/653065/jagala-juga-007-visit-estonia.jpg)

### J√§gala Waterfall

Nature

![N√µmmeveski-Liiapeksi hiking trail](https://visitestonia.com/images/3808488/1024px-Valgej%C3%B5gi5_wikimedia_commons.jpg)

### N√µmmeveski-Liiapeksi hiking trail

Nature

## A sauna is a must-do experience, no matter the season.

Black nights make a warm sauna feel extra delicious. Bar/sauna combo, old school, new age, or super Instagrammable ‚Äî there's a sauna for everyone!

![Iglupargi Iglusaunad](https://visitestonia.com/images/691882/iglupargi-iglusaunad-013-visit-estonia.jpeg)

### Iglupark igloo saunas

Saunas

![Heldeke! sauna](https://visitestonia.com/images/3948101/322107504_834973930918294_991559880806049069_n.jpg)

### Heldeke! sauna

Saunas

![Harmoonikum‚Äôs sauna ritual ‚ÄúMantsi Ann‚Äôs rose spell‚Äù](https://visitestonia.com/images/3790985/harmoonikum_saunarituaal.jpeg)

### Harmoonikum authentic Estonian sauna ritual

Saunas

![Mustam√§e Elamus Spa](https://visitestonia.com/images/677904/mustamae-elamus-spa-021-visit-estonia.jpg)

### Mustam√§e Elamus Spa

Day spas

## Need some company after dark? Venture outside of Tallinn with an experienced guide.

Seeing old buildings by lantern light or hiking by flashlight are once-in-a-lifetime experiences. Go out after dark and make it back for dinner.

![Ghostly dinners in Alatskivi Castle](https://visitestonia.com/images/3907172/P1744503_huge.jpg)

### Haunted dinners at Alatskivi Castle

Cookout & Workshops

![A Hike in Wintry Nature With Lanterns](https://visitestonia.com/images/3776321/Laternamatk+laternavalgusmatk+matkajuht+visit+estonia+puhka+eestis+matkamine+matk.jpeg)

### A Hike in Wintry Nature With Lanterns

Nature

![A lantern hike with sled dogs in the snowy forests of Tartu County](https://visitestonia.com/images/715688/laternavalguses-jalutuskaik-koos-kelgukoeraga-005-visit-estonia.jpg)

### A lantern hike with sled dogs in the snowy forests of Tartu County

Active holiday

![Romantic lamplit kicksled trip to Taevaskoja](https://visitestonia.com/images/3769661/1.jpg)

### Romantic lamplit kicksled trip to Taevaskoja

Active holiday

![Person stands in dark starry night, can see breath](https://visitestonia.com/content-images/653230/40-things-to-do-during-estonias-black-nights-en-001-visit-estonia.jpg)

## The most magical evening?

Star gazing. And if you're lucky, you might see the northern lights.

![Holidays and folk festivals in Estonia](https://visitestonia.com/content-images/722851/holidays-and-folk-festivals-in-estonia-en-003-visit-estonia.jpg)

## Holidays and folk festivals in Estonia

You probably already know about Christmas, but what about Kadrip√§ev or Vastlap√§ev? Read on to learn more about traditional Estonian holidays.

## Every season has something special ‚Äî and an extra season gives you extra time to see it all.

Expert tip: Exploring off-season will help off-load the pressure.

Visit Estonia

Last updated

15.10.2025

# Special events

### **New events coming soon.**Stay tuned and follow us!

### MEN‚ÄôS HEALTH WEEK AT KALEV SPA FITNESS CLUB 10.11-16.11.25

![](get/image/userfiles/Meeste_tervise_nadal_koduleht_ENG.png?w=900&h=506)

![](get/image/userfiles/Meeste_tervise_nadal_koduleht_ENG.png?w=900&h=506)

### MEN, IT‚ÄôS TIME TO PROVE YOURSELF!

You‚Äôre invited to take part in **Men‚Äôs Health Week at Kalev Spa Fitness Club!**  
It‚Äôs the perfect opportunity to test your limits, strengthen both body and mind, and get a real boost of motivation under the guidance of our professional trainers.

**WHY JOIN?**

Improve your **physical and mental endurance** through strength and conditioning workouts.

Experience a **friendly competitive spirit** and challenge your personal best.

Learn from **top trainers** who will share practical tips and motivation.

Enjoy **awesome prizes** from Kalev Spa and Arctic Sport!

### SCHEDULE

**Mon 10.11**  
13:00‚Äì15:00 ‚Äì Push-ups, plank hold, and wall sit challenge in the gym, led by **Peeter Karask**  
15:00‚Äì18:00 ‚Äì Training and advice by **Anu Ruutu**

**Tue 11.11**  
16:30‚Äì17:30 and 18:30‚Äì19:30 ‚Äì led by **Peeter Karask**

**Wed 12.11**  
16:30‚Äì17:30 ‚Äì led by **Peeter Karask**

**Thu 13.11**  
11:00‚Äì13:00 ‚Äì led by **Anu Ruutu**  
16:30‚Äì17:30 and 18:20‚Äì19:30 ‚Äì led by **Peeter Karask & Anu Ruutu**

17:00‚Äì17:30 and 18:30‚Äì19:00 ‚Äì led by **Tarmo Rattassepp**

**Sun 16.11**

üí• The number of push-ups, plank hold time, and wall sit duration will be combined.  
üí• Trainers will measure and record your results.  
üèÜ **Top three participants will receive prizes!**

### POOL COMPETITION

From **November 10‚Äì16**, take part in a **50 m freestyle swimming challenge** in the 50-meter pool to find out who‚Äôs the fastest!

You can swim at your preferred time in **lane 1** of the 50 m pool.  
Your time will be recorded by a swimming coach or lifeguard.

**Swimming coach available:**  
Mon‚ÄìThu 07:45‚Äì08:45 and 18:00‚Äì21:00  
Sun 19:00‚Äì20:00

üéÅ All participants will receive prizes from **A. Le Coq**!  
üéñÔ∏è Special prizes provided by **Kalev Spa**.

Winners will be announced on **November 18!**

### SPECIAL MEN‚ÄôS HEALTH WEEK OFFER

Sign up for [**adult swimming courses**](https://www.kalevspa.ee/en/fitness-center/adult-swimming-courses/) and get a **10-visit pass with a 20% discount!**

*Discounted passes are available only at the Water Park front desk.*
